name: Oc2.316s Cakit File
summary: Learn about .VAC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Researchers, mathematicians, and developers working with symbolic computation or numerical analysis were the primary users of the Oc2.316s Cakit system. Users would load the pre-defined mathematical operations stored in VAC files in the Oc2.316s Cakit environment, which assisted in automating algebraic processes.

description: A VAC file is a data file used by the now-discontinued Oc2.316s Cakit system, a computer algebra toolkit designed for polynomial arithmetic and arbitrary precision integer calculations. VAC files contain a collection of classes and functions the Oc2.316s Cakit system uses to perform complex algebraic operations.

instructions: There are no known programs that can open VAC files.
